news.description:
The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a PTB survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the game. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE: www.surveymonkey.com/r/8WVPD7Q
news.title: PTB SURVEY

news.description:
Welcome to the Public Test Build for Chapter 19! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find during this PTB.

For a full list of patch notes, click HERE: forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes.

FEATURES
  • Added a new Killer - The Trickster
  • Added a new Survivor - Yun-Jin Lee
  • Added the Chat Filter feature


    • CONTENT
  • The Blight: Reworked the collision detection for his power
  • The Wraith: Increased cloaked move speed, Decreased move speed while uncloaking
  • Accessibility: Colorblind modes added and can be accessed via the Options menu


    • VISUAL UPDATE
  • Visual Update for the main Lobby, Store and Tally


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • Ammo Items in lockers do not spawn unless the Trickster is present in a match. When playing as other Killers, the locker is empty
  • Projectiles go through pallets
  • Victor can get stuck in the Basement hook and cannot pounce on survivors
  • The Nurse may become unable to do any actions after a Blink Grab
  • Survivors do not generate Killer Instinct when interacting with the Demogorgon's Portal
  • Survivors will clip inside the environment or float during some interactions
  • Hex: Ruin does not automatically regress generators
news.title: CHAPTER 19 PTB

news.description:
People of The Fog,

Thank you for participating in the Player Test Build!

Here's a few things to know about your save data & progress in the Player Test Build:
  • Your personal profile (save data, inventory, currencies) has been copied from the Live servers to the PTB servers on February 25th, 2021 at 14:05 AM ET. Any progress or purchases made on the Live servers after this date will not be reflected on the PTB.
  • All progress made during the PTB will not be transferred over to the Live servers.

    • See you in The Fog.

    -The Dead by Daylight team
news.title: PTB - Save Game & Progress
